Medical: Park Naftalan — a destination where health, comfort, and high-quality service come together.
MainAbout: Park Naftalan Sanatorium Complex a place where health, comfort, and high-quality service come together Operating since 2022, Park Naftalan Sanatorium Complex is located on nearly 1 hectare of land in Naftalan city. The complex consists of two six-story buildings and offers 114 comfortable rooms, accommodating up to 240 guests.
AboutTxt: Park Naftalan Sanatorium Complex A place where health, comfort, and high-quality service come together Operating since 2022, Park Naftalan Sanatorium Complex is located on nearly 1 hectare of land in Naftalan city. The complex consists of two six-story buildings and offers 114 comfortable rooms, accommodating up to 240 guests. The sanatorium is equipped with the most modern medical and technical equipment. Guests are served delicious dishes from both national and European cuisine. For relaxation, a stylish Lobby Bar is available. Medical Department One of the main advantages of Park Naftalan is its wide range of effective treatment options, tailored individually under the supervision of experienced doctors.
HeaderTxt: Book your room now, enjoy the comfort!
TextForNaftalan: Naftalan oil, extracted in the city of Naftalan, Azerbaijan, is one of the world’s unique types of therapeutic oil. Thanks to its biologically active components, this oil has been known for centuries for its healing properties and has been used in the natural treatment of various diseases.
